in the sdk are a set of components tools apis uh controls

it's not wpf it's not winforms it's not uwp it's something new uh based on all those previous
frameworks all together it's released through nougats which means that it's completely decoupled
from windows now which was a big problem of wpf if a bug was found in wpf or uwp
there had to be a windows update in order to fix it so those frameworks are tied to the update cadence of the
operating system which they decided to decouple so now everything's released through nougat
we're currently at version 1.0.3 and 1.1 is in preview
